TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit ActiveDirectoryMembershipProvider extends System.Web.Security.MembershipProvider

summary.span: Manages storage of membership information for an ASP.NET application in Active Directory and Active Directory Application Mode servers.

span.span: Manages storage of membership information for an ASP.NET application in Active Directory and Active Directory Application Mode servers.

remarks.format:
## Remarks 使用此类和类提供成员资格服务使用的 Active Directory (AD) 或 Active Directory 应用程序模式 (ADAM) 服务器的 ASP.NET 应用程序。This class is used by the and classes to provide membership services for an ASP.NET application using an Active Directory (AD) or Active Directory Application Mode (ADAM) server. > [!NOTE] > 使用 ADAM 服务器需要特定的配置。Using an ADAM server requires specific configuration. 有关详细信息，请参阅下面的 ADAM 配置部分。For more information, see the ADAM Configuration section below. > [!IMPORTANT] > 只能在完全信任策略默认配置的 ASP.NET 中运行的实例。The instance works only in the full-trust policy default configuration of ASP.NET. 若要使用实例任何部分信任级别必须为应用程序到适当的信任策略文件进行更改或者必须在 GAC 中创建的"沙盒"程序集的部署。In order to use the instance at any partial-trust level, either you must make changes to the appropriate trust policy file for your application or you must create a "sandbox" assembly that is deployed in the GAC. > > 类需要不受限制的运行的权限。The class requires unrestricted permission to run. 此权限不会添加到的任何部分信任策略文件随 ASP.NET 一起提供。This permission is not added to any of the partial-trust policy files supplied with ASP.NET. 尽管添加对部分信任策略文件的权限将允许使用类，这样也使命名空间类可用于在 ASP.NET 页面中运行的任何代码。Although adding the permission to a partial-trust policy file will enable use of the class, doing so makes the namespace classes available to any code running in your ASP.NET pages. 对于需要在安全的锁定模式下运行的任何 Web 服务器不建议使用此选项。This option is not recommended for any Web servers that need to run in a secure, locked-down mode. > > 作为替代方法，你可以创建"沙盒"程序集调用类。As an alternative, you can create a "sandbox" assembly that calls the class. 此程序集可以包含的包装器类，将转发到的方法调用类或派生自类类。This assembly can contain either a wrapper class that forwards method calls to the class or a class that derives from the class. 在任一情况下，包装器类必须声明不受限制权限。In either case, the wrapper class must assert unrestricted permission. 部署沙盒程序集位于 GAC 中的并标记该程序集与(APTCA) 特性。Deploy the sandbox assembly in the GAC and mark the assembly with the (APTCA) attribute. 这将使部分受信任的 ASP.NET 代码以调用包装器类，而且由于包装类在内部断言不受限制权限，包装类将为能够成功调用该提供程序This will enable your partially trusted ASP.NET code to call your wrapper class, and since the wrapper class internally asserts the unrestricted permission, your wrapper class will be able to successfully call the provider 必须创建[connectionStrings 元素 （ASP.NET 设置架构）](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/b6ffbb2e-a4d1-410e-8f7e-9755e92c65de)标识 Active Directory 服务器、 Active Directory 域或要使用的 ADAM 应用程序分区的 Web.config 文件中的条目。You must create a [connectionStrings Element (ASP.NET Settings Schema)](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/b6ffbb2e-a4d1-410e-8f7e-9755e92c65de) entry in the Web.config file that identifies the Active Directory server, Active Directory domain, or ADAM application partition to use. 在域作用域，或在域内子作用域中，将仅运行提供程序。The provider will only operate at domain scope, or in a subscope within a domain. 下表列出了允许的连接字符串和使用的作用域。The following table lists allowed connection strings and the scope used. |连接字符串Connection string|范围Scope| |-----------------------|-----------| |LDAP: / /\<域或服务器 >: [端口]LDAP://\:[port]

端口号是可选的 ADAM 和 Active Directory 时不需要。Port number is optional for ADAM and not needed for Active Directory.|针对指定的域或服务器运行提供程序。The provider runs against the specified domain or server. 与 AD，用户创建和删除默认用户容器中完成。With AD, user creation and deletion is done in the default users container. 所有其他操作，包括任何搜索方法，将位于域的默认命名上下文。All other operations, including any search methods, will be rooted at the default naming context for the domain.

如果连接字符串指定的 Active Directory 域而不是特定服务器和属性是`true`，则实例将始终连接到与要确保该密码的域的 PDC 角色服务器更改生效，并且可用调用方法。If the connection string specifies an Active Directory domain rather than a specific server and the property is `true`, the instance will always connect to the server with the PDC role for the domain to ensure that password changes take effect and are available when the method is called.

此连接字符串时不允许使用 ADAM，并且将引发。This connection string is not allowed when using ADAM, and will throw a .| |LDAP: / /\<域或服务器 >: [port] /\<容器 dn >LDAP://\:[port]/\

端口号是可选的 ADAM 和 Active Directory 时不需要。Port number is optional for ADAM and not needed for Active Directory.|针对指定的域或服务器运行提供程序。The provider runs against the specified domain or server. 用户创建和删除只能是指定的容器中。User creation and deletion is only done in the specified container. 所有其他操作，包括任何搜索方法中，执行以容器为根的子树搜索。All other operations, including any search methods, perform subtree searches rooted at the container.

对于 ADAM 服务器，该容器指定应用程序分区或应用程序分区内的容器的根目录。For ADAM servers, the container specifies the root of an application partition, or a container within an application partition.

我们建议在连接字符串，定义特定容器，以便提高性能。We recommend that the connection string define a specific container to improve performance.| 实例映射到 directory 属性属性。The instance maps directory attributes to properties. 如果在 Web.config 文件中不执行任何属性映射，则使用默认属性。Default attributes are used if no attribute mapping is done in the Web.config file. 属性映射的详细信息，请参阅中的单个属性类文档。For more information on attribute mappings, see the individual properties in the class documentation. 下表列出了属性和其默认属性映射。The following table lists the properties and their default attribute mappings. > [!IMPORTANT] > 类不会显式检查提供程序属性未映射到的目录中用户对象的核心属性。The class does not explicitly check that provider attributes are not mapped to core attributes of the user object in the directory. 您必须确保未通过映射属性公开的目录中的敏感信息。You must ensure that sensitive information from the directory is not exposed through mapped attributes. |属性Property|默认目录属性Default directory attribute|可以映射？Can be mapped?| |--------------|---------------------------------|--------------------| ||securityIdentifiersecurityIdentifier|否No| ||userPrincipalNameuserPrincipalName|是的但必须为 userPrincipalName 或 sAMAccountNameYes, but must be either userPrincipalName or sAMAccountName| ||注释comment|否No| ||whenCreatedwhenCreated|否No| ||邮件mail|是的但必须是 Unicode 字符串类型的单值属性。Yes, but must be a single-valued attribute of type Unicode String.| ||n/an/a|不支持通过。Not supported by .| ||n/an/a|不支持通过。Not supported by .| ||pwdLastSetpwdLastSet|否No| ||无none|是的但必须是 Unicode 字符串类型的单值属性。Yes, but must be a single-valued attribute of type Unicode String.| ||用户帐户控制 (AD)User-Account-Control (AD)

mDS UserAccountDisabled (ADAM)mDS-UserAccountDisabled (ADAM)|否No| ||计算从 lockoutTime 和 AD 锁定持续时间 (在 Windows 2000 上的 AD)computed from lockoutTime and the AD lockout duration (AD on Windows 2000)

msDS-用户-帐户-控制-计算 (AD 在 Windows Server 2003 上)msDS-User-Account-Control-Computed (AD on Windows Server 2003)

msDS-用户-帐户-控制-计算 (ADAM)msDS-User-Account-Control-Computed (ADAM)|否No| ||如果由于错误密码尝试次数过多的用户被锁定，则返回的锁定时间属性。If user is locked out due to too many bad password attempts, the lockout time attribute is returned.

如果用户被锁定由于过多的错误的密码提示问题答案尝试，由定义的属性中存储的值`attributeMapFailedPasswordAnswerLockoutTime`返回。If user is locked out due to too many bad password answer attempts, the value stored in the attribute defined by `attributeMapFailedPasswordAnswerLockoutTime` is returned.

如果用户锁定由于密码不正确和错误密码尝试次数过多、 最新的日期/时间值返回。If user is locked out due to both a bad password and too many bad password attempts, the most recent date/time value is returned.

如果帐户未锁定，则返回 1/1/1754，以便与 SQL 兼容性。If the account is not locked out, return 1/1/1754 for SQL compatibility.|否No| 当同时和属性是`true`，则类支持密码重置安全通过要求用户回答预先确定的问题。When both the and properties are `true`, the class supports password-reset security by requiring the user to answer a predetermined question. 若要支持问题和答案，必须设置以下使用的配置属性[（ASP.NET 设置架构） membership 的 providers 的 add 元素](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8423ec7f-a06d-4606-977e-a46400b2fc18)应用程序配置文件中。To support the question and answer, you must set the following configuration attributes using the [add Element for providers for membership (ASP.NET Settings Schema)](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8423ec7f-a06d-4606-977e-a46400b2fc18) in the application configuration file. |配置特性Configuration attribute|特性类型Attribute type| |-----------------------------|--------------------| |`attributeMapPasswordQuestion`|必须是 Unicode 字符串类型的单值属性。Must be a single-valued attribute of type Unicode String.| |`attributeMapPasswordAnswer`|必须是 Unicode 字符串类型的单值属性。Must be a single-valued attribute of type Unicode String.| |`attributeMapFailedPasswordAnswerCount`|必须是整数类型的单值属性。Must be a single-valued attribute of type Integer.| |`attributeMapFailedPasswordAnswerTime`|必须是类型的单值属性大的整数间隔。Must be a single-valued attribute of type Large Integer/Interval.| |`attributeMapFailedPasswordAnswerLockoutTime`|必须是类型的单值属性大的整数间隔。Must be a single-valued attribute of type Large Integer/Interval.| 使用密码重置安全的详细信息，请参阅属性。For more information on using password-reset security, see the property. ## Active Directory 连接Active Directory connections 当类用于连接到 Active Directory 或 Active Directory 应用程序模式 (ADAM) 服务器上，`connectionProtection`使用设置的属性[（ASP.NET 设置架构） membership 的 providers 的 add 元素](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8423ec7f-a06d-4606-977e-a46400b2fc18)在应用程序配置文件可能会限制的操作类型类可以通过连接执行。When the class is used to connect to an Active Directory or an Active Directory Application Mode (ADAM) server, the `connectionProtection` attribute that is set using the [add Element for providers for membership (ASP.NET Settings Schema)](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8423ec7f-a06d-4606-977e-a46400b2fc18) in the application configuration file may restrict the types of operations the class can perform over the connection. `connectionProtection`属性还确定方法实例将用于创建与 Active Directory 或 ADAM 服务器的连接。The `connectionProtection` attribute also determines the methods the instance will use to create the connection to the Active Directory or ADAM server. 下表显示的效果`connectionProtection`属性连接到 Active Directory 时。The following table shows the effect of the `connectionProtection` attribute when connecting to an Active Directory. |`connectionProtection` 设置`connectionProtection` setting|效果Effect| |------------------------------------|------------| ||类将连接到具有这些限制的 Active Directory。The class will connect to an Active Directory, with these restrictions.

的设置密码任意方法将失败。- Any method that sets a password will fail. Active Directory 要求安全连接时更改密码。Active Directory requires a secure connection when changing passwords.
-您必须显式设置`connectionUsername`并`connectionPassword`属性使用[（ASP.NET 设置架构） membership 的 providers 的 add 元素](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8423ec7f-a06d-4606-977e-a46400b2fc18)应用程序配置文件; 否则为实例则会引发异常。- You must explicitly set the `connectionUsername` and `connectionPassword` attributes using the [add Element for providers for membership (ASP.NET Settings Schema)](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8423ec7f-a06d-4606-977e-a46400b2fc18) in the application configuration file; otherwise, the instance will throw a exception.| |`Secure`|类将尝试连接到 Active Directory 使用 SSL。The class will attempt to connect to Active Directory using SSL. 如果 SSL 失败，将进行第二个尝试连接到 Active Directory 使用签名-密封。If SSL fails, a second attempt to connect to Active Directory using sign-and-seal will be made. 如果这两个尝试失败，实例则会引发异常。If both attempts fail, the instance will throw a exception.

支持进程凭据和显式凭据。Both process credentials and explicit credentials are supported.| 下表显示的效果`connectionProtection`属性连接到 ADAM 服务器时。The following table shows the effect of the `connectionProtection` attribute when connecting to an ADAM server. |`connectionProtection` 设置`connectionProtection` setting|效果Effect| |------------------------------------|------------| ||类将连接到 ADAM 服务器，含此限制。The class will connect to an ADAM server, with this restriction.

的设置密码任何方法将失败，除非显式配置 ADAM 服务器以允许发送和更改通过不安全连接的密码。- Any method that sets passwords will fail unless you explicitly configure the ADAM server to allow passwords to be sent and changed over an insecure connection.

支持进程凭据和显式凭据。Both process credentials and explicit credentials are supported.| |`Secure`|类将尝试连接到 ADAM 服务器使用 SSL。The class will attempt to connect to the ADAM server using SSL. 如果无法建立连接，实例则会引发异常。If a connection cannot be made, the instance will throw a exception.

支持进程凭据和显式凭据。Both process credentials and explicit credentials are supported.| ## ADAM 配置ADAM Configuration ADAM 实例使用 ADAM 服务器时，必须包含定义的架构，`User`类。When using an ADAM server, the ADAM instance must contain a schema that defines the `User` class. 您可以导入`User`类的导入 LDIF`MS-User.ldf`文件 ADAM 安装目录中可用。You can import the `User` class with an LDIF import of the `MS-User.ldf` file available in the ADAM install directory. 类将使用 ADAM 服务器配置为使用默认网络端口。The class will work with an ADAM server configured to use the default network ports. 下表显示了 ADAM 服务器所预期的默认设置。The following table shows the defaults expected for the ADAM server. |connectionProtection 设置connectionProtection setting|预期的 ADAM 端口Expected ADAM port| |----------------------------------|------------------------| ||389389| |`Secure`|636636| 如果 ADAM 服务器不使用默认端口，请参阅文章 Q817583，"Active Directory 服务不会请求安全授权通过 SSL 连接"中[Microsoft 知识库文章](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=37115)。If your ADAM server is not using the default ports, see article Q817583, "Active Directory Services does not request secure authorization over an SSL connection," in the [Microsoft Knowledge Base](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=37115). ## Examples 下面的代码示例显示配置为使用 ASP.NET 应用程序的 Web.config 文件实例。The following code examples show the Web.config file for an ASP.NET application configured to use an instance. 第一个示例使用 Active Directory 属性的默认映射，并不支持密码重置安全提示问题答案，也不调用搜索方法的能力。The first example uses the default mappings for Active Directory attributes, and does not support password-reset security with question-and-answer nor the ability to call search methods. 第二个示例显示了允许的所有属性设置实例。The second example shows all the attribute settings allowed for an instance. 第一个示例是使用 Active Directory 属性的默认映射一个简单的配置文件。The first example is a simple configuration file using default mappings for Active Directory attributes. ``` ``` 此示例中显示所有适用的实例的属性设置。This example shows all of the attribute settings that are available for an instance of . ``` /> ``` `clientSearchTimeout` 和`serverSearchTimeout`到几分钟的默认值。`clientSearchTimeout` and `serverSearchTimeout` default to minutes. 若要更改单位，请设置`timeoutUnit`属性值为"天"、"小时"、"分钟数"、"Seconds"或"毫秒"之一。To change the units, set the `timeoutUnit` attribute value to one of "Days", "Hours", "Minutes", "Seconds", or "Milliseconds". 如果未指定该属性，默认值为"分钟"。If the attribute is not specified, the default is "Minutes".

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性可以设置为 ASP.NET 应用程序的名称; 但是，应用程序名称不由类。The property can be set to the name of the ASP.NET application; however, the application name is not used by the class. 因此，与其他不同实现，所有 ASP.NET 应用程序访问相同的 Active Directory 数据存储会始终共享相同的用户数据。Therefore, unlike other implementations, all ASP.NET applications that access the same Active Directory data store will always share the same user data.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法用于更新 Active Directory 数据存储区中的用户的密码。The method is used to update the user's password in the Active Directory data store. 而不考虑凭据的实例配置为使用，提供程序连接到 Active Directory 服务器使用`username`和`oldPassword`连接凭据作为参数。Regardless of the credentials that the instance is configured to use, the provider connects to the Active Directory server using the `username` and `oldPassword` parameters as the connection credentials. 如果属性是`true`、 用户不能更改他或她如果因为用户所做太多以前锁定该帐户的密码尝试回答密码提示问题。If the property is `true`, the user cannot change his or her password if the account was previously locked because the user made too many attempts to answer the password question. 用户将需要等待中指定的分钟数之前更改密码属性。The user will need to wait the number of minutes specified in the property before changing the password. 如果密码更改成功，属性是`true`，则用户的密码不正确答案跟踪计数器将重置。If the password change succeeds and the property is `true`, then the user's bad password answer tracking counters are reset. 提供程序查找要执行的连接字符串中指定的搜索点处开始的用户名称的子树搜索更新的用户实例。The provider finds the user instance to update by performing a subtree search for the user name starting at the search point specified in the connection string. 请参阅类主题，了解有关连接字符串的详细信息。See the class topic for more information about connection strings. 若要更改 Active Directory 服务器上的密码`connectionProtection`属性必须设置为。To change passwords on an Active Directory server the `connectionProtection` attribute must be set to . 使用 ADAM 服务器时`connectionProtection`属性可以设置为，但仅当显式配置为允许通过不安全的连接的密码更改的 ADAM 服务器。When using an ADAM server, the `connectionProtection` attribute can be set to , but only if you explicitly configure the ADAM server to allow password change over unsecured connections.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 调用方法类来更新密码提示问题和回答有关 Active Directory 成员身份存储区中的用户。The method is called by the class to update the password question and answer for a user in the Active Directory membership store. 重置用户的密码时需要密码提示问题和答案提供额外的安全层。Requiring a password question and answer provides an additional layer of security when resetting a user's password. 在创建时的用户名称，用户可以提供的问题和更高版本可用于重置忘记的密码的答案。When creating a user name, a user can supply a question and answer that can later be used to reset a forgotten password. 方法更新密码提示问题和答案成员资格用户为新值。The method updates the password question and answer for a membership user to new values. 若要使用方法，您必须在应用程序的配置文件中并将这些附加属性：In order to use the method, you must set these additional attributes in your application's configuration file: - `requiresQuestionAndAnswer` 必须是 `true.``requiresQuestionAndAnswer` must be `true.` - `attributeMapPasswordQuestion` 和`attributeMapPasswordAnswer`必须映射到 Active Directory 架构中的属性。`attributeMapPasswordQuestion` and `attributeMapPasswordAnswer` must be mapped to attributes in the Active Directory schema. 如果不满足上述条件，在初始化时引发。If the above criteria are not met, a is thrown at initialization. 实例连接到 Active Directory 数据存储区中提供的凭据`username`和`password`参数来验证用户名/密码组合。The instance connects to the Active Directory data store with the credentials provided in the `username` and `password` parameters to validate the user name/password combination. 问题和答案的实际更新使用已配置的连接的凭据提供程序的执行。The actual update of the question and answer is performed with the configured connection credentials of the provider. 如果不正确密码提供给方法中，目录服务器将递增跟踪无效密码尝试的计数器。If an incorrect password is supplied to the method, the directory server will increment the counters that track invalid password attempts. 这可能导致用户被锁定，且无法登录之前清除锁定状态是通过调用方法或经过目录中指定的锁定持续时间。This can result in the user being locked and unable to log on until either the lock status is cleared by a call to the method or the locked duration specified in the directory passes. 如果对问题和答案的更新成功，属性是`true`、 用户的密码不正确答案跟踪计数器将重置。If the update to the question and answer succeeds and the property is `true`, the user's bad password answer tracking counters are reset. 使用加密密码提示问题答案方法之前存储在 Active Directory 数据存储区。The password answer is encrypted using the method before it is stored in the Active Directory data store. 由指定的加密密钥和算法[machineKey 元素 （ASP.NET 设置架构）](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/4b5699a9-bc21-4c4a-85f1-8b3b8ebd2d46)配置元素。The encryption key and algorithm are specified by the [machineKey Element (ASP.NET Settings Schema)](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/4b5699a9-bc21-4c4a-85f1-8b3b8ebd2d46) configuration element. 上的解密特性[machineKey 元素 （ASP.NET 设置架构）](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/4b5699a9-bc21-4c4a-85f1-8b3b8ebd2d46)元素，则必须指定类不支持自动生成的加密密钥。The decryption attribute on the [machineKey Element (ASP.NET Settings Schema)](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/4b5699a9-bc21-4c4a-85f1-8b3b8ebd2d46) element must be specified, the class does not support auto-generated encryption keys. 密码提示问题的最大长度为 256 个字符。The maximum length for the password question is 256 characters. 密码提示问题答案的最大长度为 128 个字符。The maximum length for the password answer is 128 characters. 除外的所有参数值中修剪前导空格和尾随空格`password`。Leading and trailing spaces are trimmed from all parameter values except for `password`. 提供程序查找要执行的连接字符串中指定的搜索点处开始的用户名称的子树搜索更新的用户实例。The provider finds the user instance to update by performing a subtree search for the user name starting at the search point specified in the connection string. 请参阅类主题，了解有关连接字符串的详细信息。See the class topic for more information about connection strings.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法由调用类，以在 Active Directory 数据存储区中创建新用户。The method is called by the class to create a new user in the Active Directory data store. 对于 Active Directory 和 Active Directory 应用程序模式 (ADAM) 服务器，类要求的目录中的实例类为`user`。For both Active Directory and Active Directory Application Mode (ADAM) servers, the class requires that the instance class in the directory be `user`. 备用用户类，如`inetOrgPerson`不受支持。Alternative user classes such as `inetOrgPerson` are not supported. 当使用 Active Directory 服务器和用户名称映射到`userPrincipalName`属性，类将自动生成的随机 20 个字符的用户名称`sAMAccountName`代表你的参数。When using an Active Directory server and the user name is mapped to the `userPrincipalName` attribute, the class will automatically generate a random 20-character user name for the `sAMAccountName` parameter on your behalf. 参数默认为以下最大长度。Parameters default to the following maximum lengths. |参数Parameter|最大长度Maximum length| |---------------|--------------------| |`username`|如果使用 64 个字符`userPrincipalName`属性。64 characters if using the `userPrincipalName` attribute. 如果使用`sAMAccountName`属性，则通常限制为 20 个字符或更少。If using the `sAMAccountName` attribute, the common restriction is 20 characters or less.| |`password`|128 个字符。128 characters.| |`email`|256 个字符。256 characters.| |`passwordQuestion`|256 个字符。256 characters.| |`passwordAnswer`|之前和之后加密 128 个字符。128 characters before and after encrypting.| 属性对返回实例被限制为 1024年个字符。The property on the returned instance is limited to 1024 characters. 如果这些属性的最大允许长度，从而修改了目录架构，这些长度将优先。If the directory schema has been modified by reducing the maximum allowable lengths for these attributes, these lengths will take precedence. 创建用户之前,类将确保用户名称是唯一的。Before creating the user, the class will make sure the user name is unique. 如果实例配置为需要唯一的电子邮件地址，它还将确保电子邮件地址是唯一的。If the instance is configured to require unique email addresses, it will also make sure the email address is unique. 在 Active Directory 中用户名称的唯一性强制执行时的用户名称映射到 GC 搜索`userPrincipalName`。In an Active Directory user-name uniqueness is enforced by performing a GC search when the user name is mapped to `userPrincipalName`. 如果`sAMAccountName`使用，则该目录将会自动强制实施唯一性的`sAMAccountName`跨 Active Directory 域。If `sAMAccountName` is used, then the directory will automatically enforce uniqueness of the `sAMAccountName` across the Active Directory domain. ADAM 服务器将自动强制实施的用户名称唯一性`userPrincipalName`跨所有应用程序分区。An ADAM server will automatically enforce user name uniqueness of the `userPrincipalName` across all application partitions. 通过执行在其中创建用户的容器的根目录开始的重复的电子邮件地址的子树搜索强制唯一性的电子邮件地址。Uniqueness of the email address is enforced by performing a subtree search for a duplicate email address starting at the root of the container in which users are created. 这是默认用户容器 （如果连接到 Active Directory 和没有容器未指定，在连接字符串中） 或连接字符串中指定的容器。This is either the default user container (if connected to an Active Directory and no container was specified in the connection string) or the container specified in the connection string. 类直接在连接字符串中指定的用户容器中创建用户。The class creates the user directly in the user container specified in the connection string. 请参阅类主题，了解有关连接字符串的详细信息。See the class topic for more information about connection strings. 要在 Active Directory 服务器上设置的密码`connectionProtection`属性必须设置为。For passwords to be set on an Active Directory server, the `connectionProtection` attribute must be set to . 当使用 ADAM 服务器时，`connectionProtection`属性可以设置为，但仅当显式配置 ADAM 服务器以允许不安全的连接上更改密码。When an ADAM server is being used, the `connectionProtection` attribute can be set to , but only if you explicitly configure the ADAM server to allow password changes over unsecured connections. 前导空格和尾随空格删除除之外的所有字符串参数值从`password`。Leading and trailing spaces are trimmed from all string parameter values except `password`. > [!IMPORTANT] > 用于连接到 Active Directory 服务器的凭据具有域管理员权限 （不推荐） 或"创建子实例"，否则无法创建新用户"删除子实例"和"设置密码"访问权限。You cannot create new users unless the credentials used to connect to the Active Directory server have either Domain Administrator rights (not recommended) or the "create child instance," "delete child instance," and "set password" access rights. "删除子实例"访问权限是必需的因为创建用户是一个多步骤过程，并且如果用户创建的任何步骤失败，类将删除该用户实例而保留中的部分构造的用户实例目录。The "delete child instance" access right is required because creating a user is a multi-step process, and if any step of user creation fails, the class will delete the user instance rather than leave a partially constructed user instance in the directory.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性指示当前的安全级别的实例配置为使用。The property indicates the current level of security that the instance is configured to use. 属性基于`connnectionProtection`属性设置与[（ASP.NET 设置架构） membership 的 providers 的 add 元素](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8423ec7f-a06d-4606-977e-a46400b2fc18)应用程序配置文件中。The property is based on the `connnectionProtection` attribute set with the [add Element for providers for membership (ASP.NET Settings Schema)](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8423ec7f-a06d-4606-977e-a46400b2fc18) in the application configuration file. `connectionProtection`属性只能设置为或配置文件中。The `connectionProtection` attribute can only be set to or in the configuration file. 请参阅类主题，了解有关连接字符串的详细信息。See the class topic for more information about connection strings. ## Examples 下面的代码示例显示了配置 Web.config 条目实例，以使用 SSL 安全协议连接到 Active Directory 服务器。The following code example shows a Web.config entry that configures an instance to use the SSL security protocol to connect to an Active Directory server. ``` ```

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法立即移除标识的用户`username`参数。The method immediately removes the user identified by the `username` parameter. 由于 Active Directory 数据存储在独立的目录中，区域中不存储用户信息`deleteAllRelatedData`参数将被忽略，尽管它必须设置为`true`或`false`调用时方法。Since the Active Directory data store does not store user information in separate areas of the directory, the `deleteAllRelatedData` parameter is ignored, although it must be set to either `true` or `false` when calling the method. 类查找要删除通过由连接字符串的用户容器中执行的用户名称的单个搜索的用户实例。The class finds the user instance to delete by performing a single-level search for the user name in the users container determined by the connection string. 请参阅类主题，了解有关连接字符串的详细信息。See the class topic for more information about connection strings. `username` 必须是 64 个字符或更少。`username` must be 64 characters or less. > [!IMPORTANT] > 除非用来连接到 Active Directory 服务器的凭据具有任一域管理员权限 （不推荐） 或"删除子实例"访问权限，无法删除用户。You cannot delete users unless the credentials used to connect to the Active Directory server have either Domain Administrator rights (not recommended) or the "delete child instances" access right.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性指示是否可以使用方法来重置用户的密码。The property indicates whether you can use the method to reset a user's password. 属性设置在应用程序配置文件中使用`enablePasswordReset`的属性[元素 （ASP.NET 设置架构） 的成员身份](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/b9c1ee8f-33ca-4361-8666-b42a0fe86049)元素。The property is set in your application's configuration file using the `enablePasswordReset` attribute of the [membership Element (ASP.NET Settings Schema)](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/b9c1ee8f-33ca-4361-8666-b42a0fe86049) element. 您可以只设置属性`true`时以下[元素 （ASP.NET 设置架构） 的成员身份](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/b9c1ee8f-33ca-4361-8666-b42a0fe86049)元素设置进行了。You can only set the property `true` when the following [membership Element (ASP.NET Settings Schema)](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/b9c1ee8f-33ca-4361-8666-b42a0fe86049) element settings have been made. - `requiresQuestionAndAnswer` 必须为`true`。`requiresQuestionAndAnswer` must be `true`. - 必须修改 Active Directory 架构，以包含用于存储密码提示问题和答案，以及更改密码提示问题答案尝试的三个跟踪字段的属性。The Active Directory schema must be modified to contain attributes for storing the password question and answer, as well as the three tracking fields for password-answer change attempts. - `attributeMapPasswordQuestion``attributeMapPasswordAnswer`， `attributeMapFailedPasswordAnswerCount`， `attributeMapFailedPasswordAnswerTime`，和`attributeMapFailedPasswordAnswerLockoutTime`必须映射到 Active Directory 架构中的属性。`attributeMapPasswordQuestion`, `attributeMapPasswordAnswer`, `attributeMapFailedPasswordAnswerCount`, `attributeMapFailedPasswordAnswerTime`, and `attributeMapFailedPasswordAnswerLockoutTime` must be mapped to attributes in the Active Directory schema. 如果不满足上述条件，在初始化时引发。If the above criteria are not met, a is thrown at initialization. 当应用程序配置文件中的连接字符串指定的 Active Directory 域而不是特定的服务器，实例将始终连接到具有要确保的域的 PDC 角色的域控制器密码更改生效，并且可用调用方法。When the connection string in the application configuration file specifies an Active Directory domain rather than a specific server, the instance will always connect to the domain controller that has the PDC role for the domain to ensure that password changes take effect and are available when the method is called. > [!NOTE] > 即使属性是`true`，除非用于连接到 Active Directory 服务器的凭据具有域管理员权限 （不推荐） 或"重置密码"访问权限，否则不能重置用户密码。Even if the property is `true`, you cannot reset user passwords unless the credentials used to connect to the Active Directory server have either Domain Administrator rights (not recommended) or the "reset password" access right. ## Examples 下面的代码示例显示了配置 Web.config 条目实例，以使密码重置。The following code example shows a Web.config entry that configures an instance to enable password resets. 它使用给定的"重置密码"访问权限的用户的显式凭据。It uses the explicit credentials of a user given the "reset password" access right. > [!IMPORTANT] > 在 Web.config 文件中将用户凭据，则有潜在的安全威胁。When you place user credentials in your Web.config file, there are potential security threats. 具有到包含 Web.config 文件的目录的访问权限的用户可以读取该文件，并进而查看这些凭据。Users with access rights to the directory containing the Web.config file can read the file, and thus see the credentials. 有关如何保护用户免受此威胁的详细信息，请参阅[配置加密配置信息使用受保护的](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/51cdfe5b-9d82-458c-94ff-c551c4f38ed1)。For details on how to protect against this threat, see [Encrypting Configuration Information Using Protected Configuration](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/51cdfe5b-9d82-458c-94ff-c551c4f38ed1). ``` ```

remarks.format: ## Remarks 搜索 Active Directory 服务器可能是大量资源，因为属性使您能够关闭搜索面向方法。Because searching an Active Directory server is potentially resource intensive, the property enables you to turn off search-oriented methods. 属性设置在应用程序配置文件中使用`enableSearchMethods`的属性[元素 （ASP.NET 设置架构） 的成员身份](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/b9c1ee8f-33ca-4361-8666-b42a0fe86049)元素。The property is set in your application's configuration file using the `enableSearchMethods` attribute of the [membership Element (ASP.NET Settings Schema)](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/b9c1ee8f-33ca-4361-8666-b42a0fe86049) element. 当属性是`false`，以下方法不可用：When the property is `false`, the following methods are not available: - - - 提供程序使用的连接字符串中指定的搜索点处开始的子树搜索。The provider uses a subtree search starting at the search point specified in the connection string. 请参阅类主题，了解有关连接字符串的详细信息。See the class topic for more information about connection strings. 我们建议您不要启用搜索在生产系统上，直到您已确认的搜索查询，由颁发类不会产生负面影响您的目录服务器的性能。We recommend that you do not enable searching on production systems until you have confirmed that the search queries issued by the class do not adversely impact your directory server's performance. 由于类专为无状态 Web 环境中，不能使用公开的基础的分页优化Api。Since the class is designed for a stateless Web environment, it is unable to use the paging optimizations exposed by the underlying APIs. 这意味着分页操作期间对较大目录搜索时非常贵，应当避免。This means that paging operations during searches against large directories are very expensive and should be avoided. 搜索操作始终被发送给配置连接字符串中的目录服务器或在连接字符串指向域的情况下自动选定的服务器。Search operations are always issued against the directory server configured in the connection string, or an automatically selected server in the case of a connection string pointing at a domain. 用于其搜索方法，该提供程序不使用全局编录。The provider does not use a global catalog for its search methods. ## Examples 下面的代码示例显示了配置 Web.config 条目实例以启动搜索 Active Directory 服务器。The following code example shows a Web.config entry that configures an instance to enable searching an Active Directory server. ``` ```

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法获取包含在 Active Directory 中的用户记录存储匹配的`emailToMatch`参数。The method gets a containing the user records from the Active Directory store that match the `emailToMatch` parameters. 电子邮件地址将返回用户记录以升序排序。The user records are returned sorted in ascending order by email address. `emailToMatch`参数最多为 256 个字符。The `emailToMatch` parameter is limited to 256 characters. 类会发出搜索同时使用这二者`clientSearchTimeout`和`serverSearchTimeout`配置值。The class will issue the search using both the `clientSearchTimeout` and `serverSearchTimeout` configuration values. 由于类执行针对使用页与 512 每页行数的目录服务器的搜索、 超时值将应用于由提取的结果的每一页类。Since the class performs searches against the directory server using pages with 512 rows per page, the time-outs apply to each page of results fetched by the class. 例如，如果搜索查询结果中的数据，最多 1,000 行类将提取此信息作为两个数据页。For example, if a search query results in 1,000 rows of data, the class will fetch this information as two pages of data. 这意味着客户端和搜索超时值将开始从零个时，计数类请求数据的第二页。This means that the client and search time-outs will start counting from zero when the class requests the second page of data. 返回的结果方法受到`pageIndex`和`pageSize`参数。The results returned by the method are constrained by the `pageIndex` and `pageSize` parameters. `pageSize`参数指定的最大数目实例中返回。The `pageSize` parameter specifies the maximum number of instances to return in the . `pageIndex`参数指定要返回，其中 0 （零） `totalRecords` parameter is an `out` parameter that is set to the total number of matching membership users found in the Active Directory data store. 例如，如果有 13 个用户配置的数据存储区，并`pageIndex`值为 1，`pageSize`为 5，返回将包含第六到第十个用户。For example, if there are 13 users for the configured data store, and the `pageIndex` value was 1 with a `pageSize` of 5, the returned would contain the sixth through the tenth users. `totalRecords`参数将设置为 13。The `totalRecords` parameter would be set to 13. 您可以控制是否允许搜索用户，通过设置属性在应用程序配置文件中使用`enableSearchMethods`的属性[元素 （ASP.NET 设置架构） remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法类将调用方法的类来检索随机密码。The method of the class calls the method of the class to retrieve a random password. 密码长度设置的值为属性。The password length is set to the value of the property. 密码长度不能小于 14。The password length can never be less than 14. 具体而言，可以调用方法通过引用直接从提供程序的属性的类类。You can specifically call the method by referencing the class directly from the Provider property of the class. 生成的密码仅包含字母数字字符和以下标点符号: ！ @# $%^ & \* （） _-+ = [{}]};: <>|。 /？。The generated password only contains alphanumeric characters and the following punctuation marks: !@#$%^&\*()_-+=[{]};:<>|./?. 没有隐藏的或非可打印的控制字符都包含在生成的密码。No hidden or non-printable control characters are included in the generated password. 生成的密码将包含至少中指定的非字母数字字符数属性。The generated password will contain at least the number of non-alphanumeric characters specified in the property. 生成的密码也不会测试中的正则表达式属性。The generated password will not be tested with the regular expression in the property. > [!NOTE] > 类不会生成匹配的目录中设置的复杂性要求的密码。The class does not generate passwords that match complexity requirements set in the directory. 就可以生成失败目录设置的密码复杂性规则的随机密码。It is possible to generate a random password that fails the password complexity rules set by the directory.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 调用此方法类来从 Active Directory 数据存储区检索的用户名称根据用户的电子邮件地址。This method is called by the class to retrieve a user name from the Active Directory data store based on the email address for the user. 如果成员资格数据存储区中的多个用户具有相同的电子邮件地址，则返回遇到的第一个用户名。If more than one user in the membership data store has the same email address, the first user name encountered is returned. 可以设置`requiresUniqueEmail`的属性[元素 （ASP.NET 设置架构） 的成员身份](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/b9c1ee8f-33ca-4361-8666-b42a0fe86049)元素`true`应用程序配置文件，以确保每封电子邮件地址在数据库中的是唯一的。You can set the `requiresUniqueEmail` attribute of the [membership Element (ASP.NET Settings Schema)](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/b9c1ee8f-33ca-4361-8666-b42a0fe86049) element to `true` in the application configuration file to ensure that each email address in the database is unique. 删除前导和尾随空格`email`参数值。Leading and trailing spaces are trimmed from the `email` parameter value. 如果电子邮件地址在修整后为空引发。If the email address is empty after trimming, an is thrown. 电子邮件地址为`null`，会搜索 Active Directory 数据存储区中的所有用户名称，并返回第一个用户名。If the email address is `null`, all user names in the Active Directory data store are searched, and the first user name is returned. 我们建议您不要启用搜索在生产系统上，直到您已确认的搜索查询，由颁发类不会产生负面影响您的目录服务器的性能。We recommend that you do not enable searching on production systems until you have confirmed that the search queries issued by the class do not adversely impact your directory server's performance. > [!IMPORTANT] > 方法将运行，即使属性是`false`。The method will run even when the property is `false`. 由于类专为无状态 Web 环境中，不能使用公开的基础的分页优化Api。Since the class is designed for a stateless Web environment, it is unable to use the paging optimizations exposed by the underlying APIs. 这意味着分页操作期间对较大目录搜索时非常贵，应当避免。This means that paging operations during searches against large directories are very expensive and should be avoided. 搜索操作始终被发送给配置连接字符串中的目录服务器或在连接字符串指向域的情况下自动选定的服务器。Search operations are always issued against the directory server configured in the connection string, or an automatically selected server in the case of a connection string pointing at a domain. 用于其搜索方法，该提供程序不使用全局编录。The provider does not use a global catalog for its search methods. 提供程序使用的连接字符串中指定的搜索点处开始的子树搜索。The provider uses a subtree search starting at the search point specified in the connection string. 请参阅类主题，了解有关连接字符串的详细信息。See the class topic for more information about connection strings.

summary.span: Gets the number of failed answer attempts a user is allowed for the password-reset question.

span.span: Gets the number of failed answer attempts a user is allowed for the password-reset question.

value.span: 失败的密码数回答用户帐户被锁定之前允许的尝试。

span.span: The number of failed password answer attempts a user is allowed before the account is locked.

value.span: 默认值是5。

span.span: The default is 5.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当属性是`true`，用户必须回答密码提示问题，若要重置其密码。When the property is `true`, the user must answer the password question to reset his or her password. 用户通过建立的时间范围内允许有限的数量的提示问题答案尝试属性。The user is allowed a limited number of answer attempts within the time window established by the property. 如果密码提示问题答案尝试数是否大于或等于中存储的值属性，用户已锁定不能进一步尝试的分钟数存储在属性。If the number of password answer attempts is greater than or equal to the value stored in the property, the user is locked out of further attempts for the number of minutes stored in the property. > [!NOTE] > 此属性不控制用户可以进行锁定前的失败的登录尝试次数。Active Directory 服务器句柄失败登录尝试次数和不受此属性的值。This property does not control the number of failed logon attempts a user can make before being locked out. The Active Directory server handles failed logon attempts and is not affected by the value of this property. 属性设置在应用程序配置文件中使用`maxInvalidPasswordAttempts`的属性[元素 （ASP.NET 设置架构） 的成员身份](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/b9c1ee8f-33ca-4361-8666-b42a0fe86049)元素。The property is set in your application's configuration file using the `maxInvalidPasswordAttempts` attribute of the [membership Element (ASP.NET Settings Schema)](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/b9c1ee8f-33ca-4361-8666-b42a0fe86049) element. 如果应用程序的配置文件中未设置属性属性设置的默认值为`5`。If the property is not set in the application's configuration file, the property is set to the default value of `5`. ## Examples 下面的代码示例显示了配置 Web.config 条目实例来锁定进行三个失败的用户尝试在 10 分钟的时间窗口中输入密码提示问题答案。The following code example shows a Web.config entry that configures an instance to lock out users who make three failed attempts to enter the password answer in a 10-minute time window. 如果用户被锁定，无需再可能为 15 分钟进行尝试时回答密码提示问题。If the user is locked out, no further attempts to answer the password question may be made for 15 minutes. ``` ```

span.span: The time, in minutes, that a user is locked out after providing too many incorrect password answers.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当属性是`true`，用户必须回答密码提示问题，若要重置其密码。When the property is `true`, the user must answer the password question to reset his or her password. 如果用户无法提供正确答案的连续数将会等于属性值在观察指定的时间段内属性，用户不能进一步尝试锁定的分钟数中包含属性。If the user fails to supply the correct answer a consecutive number of times equal to the property value within the observation time period specified by the property, the user is locked out of further attempts for the number of minutes contained in the property. > [!NOTE] > 此属性未设置无法输入有效的密码后锁定用户的持续时间。This property does not set the duration a user is locked out after failing to enter a valid password. Active Directory 服务器句柄失败登录尝试次数和不受此属性的值。The Active Directory server handles failed logon attempts and is not affected by the value of this property. 我们建议，属性设置为相同的值为许多失败登录尝试在 Active Directory 配置为指定的帐户锁定持续时间。We recommend that the property be set to the same value as the account lockout duration specified for too many failed logon attempts in the Active Directory configuration. 这将显示用户无论是否被锁定由于登录尝试失败或错误的密码提示问题答案的一致的自动锁定行为。This will present consistent auto-lockout behavior for users regardless of whether they were locked out due to failed logon attempts or to bad password answers. 属性设置在应用程序配置文件中使用`passwordAnswerAttemptLockoutDuration`的属性[元素 （ASP.NET 设置架构） 的成员身份](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/b9c1ee8f-33ca-4361-8666-b42a0fe86049)元素。The property is set in your application's configuration file using the `passwordAnswerAttemptLockoutDuration` attribute of the [membership Element (ASP.NET Settings Schema)](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/b9c1ee8f-33ca-4361-8666-b42a0fe86049) element. 如果应用程序的配置文件中未设置属性属性设置为 30 分钟的默认值。If the property is not set in the application's configuration file, the property is set to the default value of 30 minutes. ## Examples 下面的代码示例显示了配置 Web.config 条目实例来锁定进行三个失败的用户尝试在 10 分钟的时间窗口中输入密码提示问题答案。The following code example shows a Web.config entry that configures an instance to lock out users who make three failed attempts to enter the password answer in a 10-minute time window. 如果用户被锁定，无需再可能为 15 分钟进行尝试时回答密码提示问题。If the user is locked out, no further attempts to answer the password question may be made for 15 minutes. ``` ```

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性的工作原理与结合属性以帮助防止不需要的源猜测密码或密码提示问题答案的成员资格用户通过反复尝试。The property works in conjunction with the property to help guard against an unwanted source guessing the password or password answer of a membership user through repeated attempts. 当用户尝试登录、 更改其密码或重置其密码时，在指定的时间范围内只允许一定数量的连续尝试次数。When users are attempting to log in, change their password, or reset their password, only a certain number of consecutive attempts are allowed within a specified time window. 通过指定的时间窗口长度属性，用于标识的无效尝试之间所允许的分钟数。The length of the time window is specified by the property, which identifies the number of minutes allowed between invalid attempts. 如果失败尝试次数的连续数用户重置其密码时等于中存储的值属性，以及时间后经过的最后一次的无效尝试是否为指定的分钟数小于属性，则用户帐户 s 锁定中包含的分钟数属性。If the number of consecutive failed attempts a user makes to reset his or her password equals the value stored in the property, and the time elapsed since the last invalid attempt is less than the number of minutes specified for the property, then the user account s locked out for the number of minutes contained in the property. 如果当前失败的尝试和上次失败的尝试之间的间隔大于属性设置，则当前的无效尝试均视为第一次尝试。If the interval between the current failed attempt and the last failed attempt is greater than the property setting, the current invalid attempt is counted as the first attempt. 如果达到允许的无效尝试的最大数目之前提供有效密码提示问题答案，则无效密码提示问题答案尝试次数设置为零。If a valid password answer is supplied before the maximum number of allowed invalid attempts is reached, the count of invalid password-answer attempts is set to zero. 如果允许无效的最大数目之前提供一个有效的密码尝试次数达到，无效密码尝试次数和无效密码提示问题答案尝试次数设置为零。If a valid password is supplied before the maximum number of allowed invalid attempts is reached, the count of invalid password attempts and the count of invalid password-answer attempts are set to zero. 我们建议，如帐户锁定持续时间指定为最大的失败登录尝试次数在 Active Directory 配置属性设置为相同的值。We recommend that the property be set to the same value as the account lockout duration that is specified for the maximum number of failed logon attempts in the Active Directory configuration. 是否由于登录尝试失败或错误的密码提示问题答案被锁定，这将显示用户的一致的自动锁定行为。This will present consistent auto-lockout behavior for users whether they were locked out due to failed logon attempts or to bad password answers. 属性设置在应用程序配置文件中使用`passwordAttemptWindow`的属性[元素 （ASP.NET 设置架构） 的成员身份](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/b9c1ee8f-33ca-4361-8666-b42a0fe86049)元素。The property is set in your application's configuration file using the `passwordAttemptWindow` attribute of the [membership Element (ASP.NET Settings Schema)](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/b9c1ee8f-33ca-4361-8666-b42a0fe86049) element. 如果应用程序的配置文件中未设置属性属性设置为 10 分钟的默认值。If the property is not set in the application's configuration file, the property is set to the default value of 10 minutes. ## Examples 下面的代码示例显示了配置 Web.config 条目实例来锁定进行三个失败的用户尝试在 10 分钟的时间窗口中输入密码提示问题答案。The following code example shows a Web.config entry that configures an instance to lock out users who make three failed attempts to enter the password answer in a 10-minute time window. 如果用户被锁定，无需再可能为 15 分钟进行尝试时回答密码提示问题。If the user is locked out, no further attempts to answer the password question may be made for 15 minutes. ``` ```

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性获取用于评估密码复杂性的正则表达式。The property gets the regular expression used to evaluate password complexity. 属性不用于验证中的自动生成密码方法。The property is not used to validate auto-generated passwords in the method. 属性设置在应用程序配置中使用`passwordStrengthRegularExpression`的属性[元素 （ASP.NET 设置架构） 的成员身份](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/b9c1ee8f-33ca-4361-8666-b42a0fe86049)配置元素。The property is set in the application configuration using the `passwordStrengthRegularExpression` attribute of the [membership Element (ASP.NET Settings Schema)](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/b9c1ee8f-33ca-4361-8666-b42a0fe86049) configuration element. ## Examples 下面的示例演示[元素 （ASP.NET 设置架构） 的成员身份](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/b9c1ee8f-33ca-4361-8666-b42a0fe86049)中的配置元素`system.web`部分中的应用程序的 Web.config 文件。The following example shows the [membership Element (ASP.NET Settings Schema)](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/b9c1ee8f-33ca-4361-8666-b42a0fe86049) configuration element in the `system.web` section of the application's Web.config file. 它指定应用程序使用的实例类提供成员资格服务和集`passwordStrengthRegularExpression`属性验证的密码符合以下条件的正则表达式：It specifies that the application use an instance of the class to provide membership services and sets the `passwordStrengthRegularExpression` attribute to a regular expression that validates that the password meets the following criteria: - 大于七个字符。Is greater than seven characters. - 包含至少一个数字。Contains at least one digit. - 包含至少一个特殊的 （非字母数字） 字符。Contains at least one special (non-alphanumeric) character. 如果密码不满足这些条件，成员资格提供程序不接受此密码。If the password does not meet these criteria, the password is not accepted by the membership provider. ``` ```

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性设置在应用程序配置文件中使用`requiresQuestionAndAnswer`的属性[元素 （ASP.NET 设置架构） 的成员身份](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/b9c1ee8f-33ca-4361-8666-b42a0fe86049)元素。The property is set in your application's configuration file using the `requiresQuestionAndAnswer` attribute of the [membership Element (ASP.NET Settings Schema)](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/b9c1ee8f-33ca-4361-8666-b42a0fe86049) element. 如果应用程序的配置文件中未设置属性属性设置的默认值为`false`。If the property is not set in the application's configuration file, the property is set to the default value of `false`. 当`requiresQuestionAndAnswer`属性设置为`true`，还必须设置这些附加属性。When the `requiresQuestionAndAnswer` attribute is set to `true`, you must also set these additional attributes. - `attributeMapPasswordQuestion` 和`attributeMapPasswordAnswer`必须映射到 Active Directory 架构中的属性。`attributeMapPasswordQuestion` and `attributeMapPasswordAnswer` must be mapped to attributes in the Active Directory schema. 如果不满足上述条件，在初始化时引发。If the above criteria are not met, a is thrown at initialization. > [!NOTE] > 您可以创建用户时需要密码提示问题和答案，但设置属性设置为`false`若要防止用户更改其密码使用类。You can require a password question and answer when creating a user, but set the property to `false` to prevent users from changing their passwords using the class. ## Examples 下面的代码示例显示了配置 Web.config 条目实例，以使密码重置。The following code example shows a Web.config entry that configures an instance to enable password resets. 它使用给定的"重置密码"访问权限的用户的显式凭据。It uses the explicit credentials of a user given the "reset password" access right. > [!IMPORTANT] > 在 Web.config 文件中将用户凭据，则有潜在的安全威胁。When you place user credentials in your Web.config file, there are potential security threats. 具有到包含 Web.config 文件的目录的访问权限的用户可以读取该文件，并进而查看这些凭据。Users with access rights to the directory containing the Web.config file can read the file, and thus see the credentials. 有关如何保护用户免受此威胁的详细信息，请参阅[配置加密配置信息使用受保护的](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/51cdfe5b-9d82-458c-94ff-c551c4f38ed1)。For details on how to protect against this threat, see [Encrypting Configuration Information Using Protected Configuration](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/51cdfe5b-9d82-458c-94ff-c551c4f38ed1). ``` ```

remarks.format: ## Remarks 调用方法类以将 Active Directory 数据存储区中的用户的密码重置为新随机生成的值。The method is called by the class to reset the password for a user in the Active Directory data store to a new randomly generated value. 返回新的密码。The new password is returned. > [!NOTE] > 通过创建随机密码方法不能保证传递中的正则表达式属性。The random password created by the method is not guaranteed to pass the regular expression in the property. 但是，随机的密码将符合确立的条件和属性。However, the random password will meet the criteria established by the and properties. 如果不正确的答案提供给方法中，内部计数器跟踪无效密码提示问题答案尝试就会递增 1。If an incorrect answer is supplied to the method, the internal counter that tracks invalid password-answer attempts is incremented by one. 这可能导致用户无法登录，直至通过调用清除锁定状态方法。This can result in the user being unable to log on until the lock status is cleared by a call to the method. 如果提供正确的密码答案，并且用户当前未被锁定，则跟踪无效密码尝试的内部计数器重置为零。If the correct password answer is supplied and the user is not currently locked out, then the internal counter that tracks invalid password attempts is reset to zero. 有关详细信息，请参阅和属性。For more information, see the and properties. 删除所有参数值的前导和尾随空格。Leading and trailing spaces are trimmed from all parameter values. 您可以调用方法首先获取对引用由直接实例从属性。You can call the method directly by first obtaining a reference to the instance from the property. 提供程序使用的连接字符串中指定的搜索点处开始的子树搜索。The provider uses a subtree search starting at the search point specified in the connection string. 请参阅类主题，了解有关连接字符串的详细信息。See the class topic for more information about connection strings. 将密码设置为在 Active Directory 服务器上`connectionProtection`属性必须设置为。To set passwords on an Active Directory server, the `connectionProtection` attribute must be set to . 使用 ADAM 服务器时`connectionProtection`属性可以设置为，但仅当显式配置 ADAM 服务器以允许不安全的连接上更改密码。When using an ADAM server, the `connectionProtection` attribute can be set to , but only if you explicitly configure the ADAM server to allow password changes over unsecured connections. > [!IMPORTANT] > 除非用来连接到 Active Directory 服务器的凭据具有域管理员权限 （不推荐） 或"重置密码"访问权限，无法重置密码。You cannot reset passwords unless the credentials used to connect to the Active Directory server have either Domain Administrator rights (not recommended) or the "reset password" access right. 若要重置密码，必须满足所有以下条件：To reset a password, all of the following conditions must be true: - 属性必须设置为`true`。The property must be set to `true`. - 必须修改 Active Directory 架构以包含用于存储密码提示问题和答案，属性和密码的三个跟踪字段回答的更改。The Active Directory schema must be modified to contain attributes for storing the password question and answer, and the three tracking fields for password answer changes. - `attributeMapPasswordQuestion`， `attributeMapPasswordAnswer`， `attributMapFailedPasswordAnswerCount`， `attributeMapFailedPasswordAnswerTime`，和`attributeMapFailedPasswordAnswerLockedTime`属性必须设置应用程序配置文件中。The `attributeMapPasswordQuestion`, `attributeMapPasswordAnswer`, `attributMapFailedPasswordAnswerCount`, `attributeMapFailedPasswordAnswerTime`, and `attributeMapFailedPasswordAnswerLockedTime` attributes must be set in the application configuration file. - 属性必须设置为`true`。The property must be set to `true`. - 用于连接到 Active Directory 数据存储区 （进程帐户或显式凭据） 的安全上下文必须具有足够的权限更改密码。The security context for connecting to the Active Directory data store (either the process account or the explicit credentials) must have sufficient privileges to change passwords. 用于连接到 Active Directory 服务器的凭据具有域管理员权限 （不推荐） 或"重置密码"访问权限。The credentials used to connect to the Active Directory server have either Domain Administrator rights (not recommended) or the "reset password" access right. > [!NOTE] > 在 Active Directory 服务器上设置安全策略可能会使其不可能方法以生成满足策略。Security policies set on the Active Directory server may make it impossible for the method to generate a password that satisfies the policies. 默认实现方法将生成满足运行 Windows Server 2003 SP1 的域控制器上的默认密码策略的密码。The default implementation of the method will generate passwords that satisfy the default password policies on domain controllers running Windows Server 2003 SP1. 如果密码不能重置安全策略在 Active Directory 服务器上，由于引发。If the password cannot be reset due to security policies on the Active Directory server, a is thrown.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 用户最常被锁定，无法通过验证方法时属性中指定的时间内超出属性或时已进行过多次尝试以使用了错误的密码登录。Users are most commonly locked out and cannot be validated by the method when the property is exceeded within the time specified in the property or when too many attempts have been made to log on using the wrong password. 如果属性是`true`，当用户时，会重置错误密码解锁计数器。If the property is `true`, when a user is unlocked the counters for bad passwords are reset. 提供程序使用的连接字符串中指定的搜索点处开始的子树搜索。The provider uses a subtree search starting at the search point specified in the connection string. 请参阅类主题，了解有关连接字符串的详细信息。See the class topic for more information about connection strings. 删除前导和尾随空格`username`参数值。Leading and trailing spaces are trimmed from the `username` parameter value.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 调用此方法类，以验证针对 Active Directory 数据存储区的用户凭据。This method is called by the class to validate user credentials against the Active Directory data store. 如果属性是`true`和所提供的凭据有效，用户的密码不正确答案的跟踪计数器将重置。If the property is `true` and the supplied credentials are valid, the user's tracking counters for bad password answers are reset. 方法可能会返回`false`时提供正确的凭据，在下列情况下：The method may return `false` when the correct credentials are supplied, under the following circumstances: 1. 用户帐户被锁定的目录服务器由于失败的登录尝试次数太多。The user account was locked out by the directory server because of too many failed logon attempts. 用户将无法登录，直至目录的锁定持续时间将传递。The user will not be able to log on until the directory's lockout duration passes. 2. 如果属性是`true`，在用户提供一个密码不正确的答案的次数过多锁定的用户帐户。If the property is `true`, the user account will be locked if the user supplied a bad password answer too many times. 用户的帐户中指定的时间后将解锁属性传递。The user's account will unlock after the time specified in the property has passed. 3. 用户必须在连接字符串中指定的容器中存在。The user must exist in the container specified in the connection string. 为位于不同的容器或不同域中的用户帐户提供有效的凭据。Valid credentials are supplied for a user account located in a different container or in a different domain. 用户必须在连接字符串中指定的容器中存在。The user must exist in the container specified in the connection string. 在验证用户时，该提供程序通过连接到 Active Directory 数据存储区使用指定的用户名和密码，不是应用程序配置文件中配置的凭据来验证凭据。When validating a user, the provider validates the credentials by connecting to the Active Directory data store using the specified user name and password, not the credentials configured in the application configuration file. 但是，实例将连接到由于以下原因使用配置的凭据的目录。However, the instance will connect to the directory using the configured credentials for the following reasons. - 若要确认用户存在内搜索范围由实例的连接字符串。To confirm that a user exists within the search scope as determined by the instance's connection string. 提供程序使用的连接字符串中指定的搜索点处开始的子树搜索以确定用户是否存在。The provider uses a subtree search starting at the search point specified in the connection string to determine whether a user exists. 用户必须存在于指定的容器。The user must exist in the specified container. 将不会验证有效连接字符串的指定容器外的凭据。Credentials that are valid outside the connection string's specified container will not be validated. 请参阅类主题，了解有关连接字符串的详细信息。See the class topic for more information about connection strings. - 如果属性是`true`，则实例将使用配置的凭据来加载要检查是否该用户已锁定因为他或她已进行了更改密码提示问题答案尝试次数过多失败的用户实例.If the property is `true`, the instance will use the configured credentials to load the user instance to check whether the user has been locked out because he or she has made too many failed attempts to change the password answer. > [!IMPORTANT] > 使用启用了"Guest"帐户连接到 Active Directory 域控制器是潜在的安全威胁。Connecting to an Active Directory domain controller with the "Guest" account enabled is a potential security threat. 与"Guest"帐户已启用 Active Directory 域控制器上所做的所有验证尝试将会都成功。All validation attempts made on an Active Directory domain controller with the "Guest" account enabled will succeed. 若要使用的 Active Directory 域控制器时，可提高安全性，应禁用域控制器上的"来宾"帐户。To improve security when using an Active Directory domain controller, you should disable the "Guest" account on the domain controller. 实例将尝试根据 Active Directory 并发绑定时满足以下条件之一：The instance will attempt a concurrent bind against Active Directory when one of the following conditions is met: - 属性设置为 。The property is set to . - 属性设置为并选择 SSL实例来保护连接。The property is set to and SSL is chosen by the instance to secure the connection. 此外，若要进行并发绑定，以下条件必须为 true:In addition, for a concurrent bind to be made, the following conditions must be true: - 目录服务器必须运行 Windows Server 2003 上。The directory server must be running on Windows Server 2003. - 运行的 Web 服务器的操作系统实例必须支持并发绑定 (例如，Windows Server 2003)。The operating system of the Web server running the instance must support concurrent binds (for example, Windows Server 2003). 使用并发绑定时，用户的上次登录日期未更新的目录; 中因此，不能依赖于属性。When a concurrent bind is used, the last logon date for the user is not updated in the directory; therefore, the property cannot be relied on. 删除前导和尾随空格`username`参数。Leading and trailing spaces are trimmed from the `username` parameter.
